plot: A mother, A hitman, and an undercover police officer are drawn together as they try to rescue girls kidnapped into the sex trade, and bring down the organization responsible.
title: The Helpless
plot_es: A mother, A hitman, and an undercover police officer are drawn together as they try to rescue girls kidnapped into the sex trade, and bring down the organization responsible.
plot_en: A mother, A hitman, and an undercover police officer are drawn together as they try to rescue girls kidnapped into the sex trade, and bring down the organization responsible.
